links.title: Beam Global launches BeamSpot™ curbside charger
VIDEO: Beam Global Hosts Live-Streamed Tour of Beam Europe
links.content:
INTRODUCING THE BEAMWELL OFF-GRID WATER DESALINATION SYSTEM FOR CRISIS ZONES  [ News Flash](/beam-global-launches-beamwell-water-desalination-and-delivery-system-to-provide-clean-water-and-electricity-in-crisis-zones/)

[ ![Beam](https://beamforall.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/BEAM-Logo-Icon-Color-and-White-Medium-180x135-1.png) ![Beam](https://beamforall.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/BEAM-Logo-Icon-Color-and-White-Medium-180x135-1.png) ](https://beamforall.com/ "Beam")

# VIDEO: Beam Global Hosts Live-Streamed Tour of Beam Europe

The virtual tour was the first public look at the recent acquisition and took place on Thursday, November 9, 2023

![Beam-Europe Tour2023](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201140%20900'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

![Beam Global Host Live Streamed Tour of Beam Europe](https://i.ytimg.com/vi/Xk6ZgWjgBeM/hqdefault.jpg)

Get ready for an extraordinary journey into the heart of Beam Global’s innovative strides in electrification and sustainable infrastructure solutions. On Thursday, November 9, 2023, CEO Desmond Wheatley live-streamed a tour of Beam Global’s newly acquired European operations. This exclusive exploration showcased the state-of-the-art Beam Europe office, cutting-edge engineering facilities, and high-capacity manufacturing plants. For those fascinated by Beam Global’s expansion, this is a fantastic opportunity to witness firsthand the extensive and well-equipped facilities that now belong to the company in the largest market for their products globally.

Highlights of the tour include:

  * **Introduction to Beam Europe Team:** Meet the skilled engineers and manufacturing experts from the newly formed European team, who are collaborating with their U.S. counterparts to introduce Beam Global’s patented products to a rapidly growing market.
  * **Market Expansion:** With 210 employees, Beam Europe significantly broadens market reach, product development, and manufacturing capacity. The facilities, previously owned by Amiga, one of Europe’s leading manufacturers of streetlights, are poised to bring Beam Global’s innovative EV Standard™ to market in both Europe and the U.S.
  * **Strategic Acquisition:** On October 24, 2023, Beam Global completed the acquisition of Amiga DOO Kraljevo, enhancing its position as a leader in the green economy. This strategic move is expected to increase barriers to entry for future competitors, fortifying Beam Global’s foothold in the European market.



Thank you for joining us today.

[ ](# "Scroll To Top")

## About SEC Filings 

Nasdaq provides company’s [SEC filings](https://www.nasdaq.com/market-activity/quotes/sec-filings), which are financial statements and reports filed electronically with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) by Quotemedia. 

The SEC requires all publicly traded companies, foreign and domestic, to disclose financial condition, operating results, management compensation, and other areas of their business on a regular basis. This information can be used by investors to verify and understand the financial position of the company. Many, but not all SEC filings are available in the SEC’s EDGAR database.
